channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Shrub having over onto the footpath / near tyre shop, 25th June
item.description:
The shrub is hanging over the fence onto the public footpath and needs cutting back please because it obstructs the footpath which pedestrians have to use to stay safe whiie cars are driving into the tyre shop .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: By Railway bridge Bellegrove road, 25th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellegrove Road, Falconwood, London

item.description:

item.title: Damaged manhole cover outside No. 38 Avondale Road. This has been cordoned off with safety barriers for over a month., 25th June
item.description:
The damaged manhole cover needs to be repaired as it's been over a month now that this has had safety barriers around the damage. However, this has made the pavement unpassable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avondale Road, Sundridge, London
